【考法 1】 v. 阻碍： to check or stop by or as if by an obstacle
【例】The police balked the attempt to kidnap the child.
【近】 circumvent, frustrate, foil, thwart[θwɔːt]
【反】advance, forward, foster, nurture, promote 推进
【考法 2】 v. 不愿接受，拒绝： to show unwillingness to accept, do, engage in, or agree to
【例】 She balked at the very idea of compromise. 她固执地拒绝妥协的想法
【近】 decline, refuse, spurn[spɜːn], repudiate[rɪ'pjuːdɪeɪt], turn down
【反】 accept, approve 同意
【派】 balky adj. 倔强的
【记】 block 木块，阻挡；近obstacle
【另】 bulk 大小, 体积, 大批
